Text: do i have to jailbreak my ps3 to play this?

@blamneng
Yes. All the games that you download, except the ones from the official PSN, need a mod.

I did a softmod - which is the easiest.
Update to the latest official firmware, and then install PSP Pro-B10. Youtube on how to, and you might agree it's simple as eating pie. Good luck.
is it the us version or european?(i need to know cause i wanna import my EUR save files from the ps3)
